name: SQUADEX
description:
SQUADEX is a technology consulting & engineering company that provides software delivery automation which enables organization to accelerate growth.
We believe that greater business efficiency can be achieved through transforming disjoined organizations and processes into a squad of technology and automation.
Through our solutions we eliminate the boundaries between organisations in the enterprise leading to improved time-to-market and optimized cost of new product introduction.
Weâ€™re nerds by nature, we dive deep into nuts & bolts of technology advantages to make sure our solutions are highly sophisticated and/to anticipate the outcome/expectations.
Since 2011 we have helped many Silicon Valley clients build solutions to ensure sustainable growth and dramatically improve the lives of the end users.
